title: Covid-19 live updates: U.S. 'keeping a very close eye' on mu variant, Fauci says
content:
1. Covid-19 live updates: U.S. 'keeping a very close eye' on mu variant, Fauci says  The Washington Post
  2. WHO: New Covid mu variant needs careful observation  CNBC Television
  3. The WHO is tracking a new COVID-19 variant called Mu that might be able to evade immunity from vaccines and previous infections  Yahoo! Voices
  4. Mu: everything you need to know about the new coronavirus variant of interest  The Conversation Africa
  5. What’s the 'Mu' variant? Will we keep seeing more concerning Covid-19 variants?  Deccan Herald
